name: Spicy-Tart Kale Limeade
description: Ginger adds heat to this tart kale limeade. Apple juice and coconut water tame the intense flavor—think of this as green juice for beginners—it's friendly, fun, and a little (naturally) sweet.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh kale juice (from about 3/4 pounds kale)
1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh ginger juice (from about 5 ounces peeled ginger)
1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh apple juice (from 2 large green apples or 4 small)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix kale juice, ginger juice, and apple juice with coconut water. Serve in tall glasses. Garnish with lime slice if desired.
